content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS" 
| summarize Volume=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Events, by time

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS" 
| summarize Volume=count() by Category, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Events categories, by time

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| summarize amount = count() by Resource, ResourceGroup
content.title: Firewall per resource group

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS" 
| summarize Volume=count() by Category
content.title: Events, by category

content.json:
---
# Azure Firewall - Application rule log statitics

content.query:
let ActivityData = AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." *
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt)
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action")
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort)
| where Action == "Deny";
ActivityData
| summarize Amount=count() by SourceIP
| join kind = inner
(
    ActivityData
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SourceIP) on SourceIP
    | project-away SourceIP1, TimeGenerated
    | top 10 by Amount
    | sort by Amount
content.title: Unique Source IP addresses

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule" 
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails 
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." *
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort) 
| where Action == "Deny" 
|  summarize Amount=dcount(SourceIP) by SourceIP, Protocol, URL = FQDN, TargetPortInt, Action
content.title: Unique source IP addresses

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule" | parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails | parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 | parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * | parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a | parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b | extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) | extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) | extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") | extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort)| where Action == "Deny" 
| summarize count() by URL=FQDN, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Denied URLs over time

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule" 
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails 
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * 
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort)
| where Action == "Deny" 
| summarize count() by URL=FQDN

AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule" 
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails 
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * 
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort) 
| where Action == "Allow" 
| summarize count() by URL=FQDN, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Allowed URLs over time

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule" | parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails | parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 | parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * | parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a | parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b | extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) | extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) | extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") | extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort) | where Action == "Allow" 
| summarize count() by URL=FQDN

AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule" 
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails 
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * 
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort) 
| summarize count() by URL=FQDN, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain}), Action, SourcePort, TargetPort
content.title: All IP addresses events

content.json:
---
# Azure Firewall - Network rule log statistics

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule" 
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination 
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)  
| summarize count() by Action
content.title: Rule actions

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule" 
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination 
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action: " Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort), NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)  
| summarize Count=count() by TargetPort
content.title: Target ports

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule" 
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", 
case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),
Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),
SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),
TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),
SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),
TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),
NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)  
| where Action == "DNAT'ed"
| summarize Amount=count() by NatDestination
content.title: DNAT actions

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule" 
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", 
case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),
Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),
SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),
TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),
SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),
TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),
NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)  
| summarize amount = count() by Action , SourceIP
content.title: Rule actions, by IP addresses

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule" 
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination 
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action: " Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", 
case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),Protocol = case(Protocol == "", 
Protocol2, Protocol),SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),
TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),
SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),
TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort), 
NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", 
"N/A", NatDestination)  
| summarize AMOUNT=count() by TargetPort, SourceIP
content.title: Target ports, by Source IP

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule" 
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", 
case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),
Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),
SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),
TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),
SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),
TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),
NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)  
| where Action == "DNAT'ed"
| summarize Amount=count() by NatDestination, TimeGenerated
content.title: DNAT'ed over time

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from" SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to" TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int *
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a
| parse msg_s with * " was " Action1b " to " NatDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from" SourceIP2 " to" TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)
| summarize count() by Action, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Actions, by time
